text: Paadatha Veenayum Paadum is a 1990 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sasikumar, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Rekha in the lead roles. http://www.malayalacinema.com/userreview_paadatha-veenayum-paadum-.htm ==Cast== * Uma Maheswari * Raghu (Karan) * Innocent * Beena * KPAC Sabu * Mala Aravindan * Mamukkoya * VK Sreeraman ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Paadatha Veenayum Paadum
